Description:
Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "--insecure" flag.

Author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Insecure Transfer Via Curl.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\curl.exe' and original_file_name = 'curl.exe') and (command re '\s-k\s' and command like '%--insecure%'))
